DOC.brief_summary: To assess the efficacy and safety of vildagliptin add-on therapy to reduce HbA1c in patients with T2DM inadequately controlled by insulin, with or without concurrent metformin therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Vildagliptin as add-on Therapy to Insulin in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Confirmed diagnosis of T2DM On a stable dose of insulin as defined by the protocol On a stable does of metformin (if applicable) as defined by the protocol Age 18 to 80 years HbA1c of 7.5 to 11.0% Body Mass Index (BMI) 22 to 40 kg/m2 Type 1 diabetes Shortacting or rapidacting insulin Pregnancy or lactation Evidence of serious diabetic complications Evidence of serious cardiovascular complications Laboratory value abnormalities as defined by the protocol Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply
